coreAtributes.name: Holy Ring
coreAtributes.description: A ring that fits onto a person's tail. It has been forged from holy metal and inscribed with mystic symbols. It is rumoured that only the Digidestined can read the inscribed Digicode on the ring.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide on the holy ring onto your tail.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide on the holy ring on [npc.name]'s tail.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You forcefully slams the holy ring onto [npc.name]'s tail.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides the holy ring onto [npc.her] tail.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides the holy ring onto your tail.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forcefully slams the holy ring onto your tail.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc.Name] slides on the holy ring onto [npc2.name]'s tail.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] forcefully slams on the holy ring onto [npc2.name]'s tail.
